title: Project-Based Science Learning Design to Improve the Effectiveness of Online Tutoring and E-Moderation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Science project-based learning design for non-degree adult learners in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can facilitate structured discussions on scientific topics in online discussion platforms.
Learners improve project deliverables based on peer feedback and e-moderator guidance.
Learners can build effective online learning communities using tools accessible in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
